## ✍ Other changes

* Improvements (#311) @offa

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump bom-2.303.x from 1362.v59f2f3db_80ee to 1382.v7d694476f340 (#312) @dependabot

<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->
## ✍ Other changes

* added buildUrl property for overriding the url used for the build / run (#303) @marchaos

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump bom-2.303.x from 1117.v62a_f6a_01de98 to 1210.vcd41f6657f03 (#300) @dependabot

<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->
* Move away from deprecated Release Drafter App (#296) @NotMyFault
* Fix setBuildStatus to handle both String and StashBuildState arguments in a single method (#297) @robinverduijn
* Fix currentBuild.result value 'FAILURE' (#301) @barney2k7
* Remove JSR 305 / Clean-up (#285) @offa

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump plugin from 4.34 to 4.38 (#299) @dependabot
* Bump plugin from 4.33 to 4.34 (#291) @dependabot
* Bump plugin from 3.57 to 4.33 (#284) @dependabot
* Bump git-changelist-maven-extension from 1.0-beta-7 to 1.3 (#286) @dependabot
* Bump bom-2.303.x from 1055.v9637a690f734 to 1117.v62a_f6a_01de98 (#287) @dependabot

<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->
* Implement setters instead of constructor for optional parameters (#246) @westarne
* update parent pom, use plugin bom, remove powermock (#279) @jetersen
* Replace deprecated assertions (#278) @offa
* Enable Dependabot (#277) @offa

* Personal Access Token can be provide using secret text Credential (#276) @noxo
* Configure release drafter (#261) @darxriggs

* #273 Swappable HTTP Client (@sghill)
* Multiple codebase improvements (@darxriggs) #249 #250 #251 #252 #253 #254 #255 #256 #257 #258 #259

name: 1.20 - Overridable build state and build name for pipelines
body:
* #240 pom.xml: Fix bundling of sshd-core.jar, update git dependency (@proski)
* #243 Make build state and build name overwritable (@westarne)

* Add setters to the StashNotifier.DescriptorImpl class #201 (@alexchiri)
 * Upgrade Apache HTTP client #229 (@darxriggs)
 * Minor readme improvements #228 (@darxriggs)
 * Improvements #227 (@darxriggs)
 * Remove option to set project key globally (was broken) #226 (@darxriggs)
 * Replace all user-facing "Stash" with "Bitbucket Server" #225 (@darxriggs)

name: 1.16 Support latest git scm and git client

body:
* Plugin DSL alias (@bakito)
 * Support SHA-1 Lookup for all type of runs (@ColMelvin)
 * Remove escaping in build display names (@hrkn)

* Pipeline compatibility (@thebignet)
* Support Blue Ocean URL (@htanjo)
* Allow TokenMacro in Stash server URL (@mdkf)
* Improved considering unstable as success (@korlat)

name: 1.11 Pipeline support
body:
- Support `NOT BUILD` state (@aaronjwood)
- Support Pipeline plugin (@djaara and @ckuhn)
- Fix some https <--> http proxy commincation bugs (@ghawkgu)

name: bugfix release
body:
- #79 Jenkins Root URL not configured (@aaronjwood)
- #78 #76 Fix credentials management process (@stevengssns)  Fix #86  Fix #78

- Unit tests and bugfixes (@magnusr)
- Abbreviate fields (@lukasniemeier-zalando)
- Credentials plugin integration (@pdodds)
- TokenMacro plugin integration
- Extended project key configuration (custom key + prepending of parent build keys if exists)
- Some travis automation for intermediate artifact builds on tag (now it's stored within release automatically)

- Now honors no-proxy host configuration on Jenkins (see #51, thanks to @bbaetz)
- Improved handling of build descriptions (see #50, thanks to @Lakritzator)
- Now supports "Merge before build" option of git plugin. Notifies both merge and original commit. (see #48, thanks to @klieber)
- Fixes Server Name Indication problem when stash runs on same server with another SSL site (see #46, thanks to @nightwolfzor)
